name: internxt-sync
description: WebDAV File Uploader for Internxt Drive. Securely uploads files to Internxt Drive using WebDAV. To run tests, use 'bun run test:src' which runs only the tests that have been fixed to work with Bun's testing framework.

scripts.build: bun build internxt-sync.ts --outdir dist --target node --format esm && bun build bin.js --outdir dist --target node --format esm
scripts.build:bundle: bun build internxt-sync.ts --outdir dist --target node --format esm --splitting --packages=bundle && bun build bin.js --outdir dist --target node --format esm --splitting --packages=bundle
scripts.test:watch: bun test --watch --tsconfig-override tsconfig.test.json --preload ./src/test/test-helpers/setup.ts src/test/fs-utils.test.ts src/test/webdav-directory-service.test.ts src/test/file-scanner.test.ts
scripts.test:src: bun test --tsconfig-override tsconfig.test.json --preload ./src/test/test-helpers/setup.ts src/test/logger.test.ts src/test/progress-tracker.test.ts src/test/uploader.test.ts
scripts.prepare:publish: bun clean:win && bun run build:bundle && bun run test:src

author: ngarate
